Articles.Content:
Hello,

This is my first post on this forum. My native language is Dutch, so my English may be a bit painful to read ... !

Although KSP is currently Alpha, it\'s already a brilliant game in my opinion. It\'s also a bit educative; now I know gravity of a reasonable big sized celestial body extends beyond its atmosphere (if it has one ... !)

I\'m looking forward to explore this game and forum further.

Greetings ... !

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

You already speak better English than some native English speakers..

Welcome to the forums, and enjoy the game!
Salutations Bekiekutmoar, and welcome to the KSP community, have fun flying
